smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function getHolidays appears to be too complex.
The function calculate appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: RuntimeException is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: stateSpinner.selectedItem cannot be safely cast to StateItem?.
parent.getItemAtPosition(pos) cannot be safely cast to StateItem.
adapter cannot be safely cast to HolidayAdapter.
jsonObject[keyStates] cannot be safely cast to JSONArray.
statesArray[i] cannot be safely cast to JSONObject.
jsonObject[keyHolidays] cannot be safely cast to JSONArray.
holidayArray[i] cannot be safely cast to JSONObject.
holidayObj[keyStates] cannot be safely cast to JSONArray.
holidayObj[keyId] cannot be safely cast to Int.
holidayObj[keyName] cannot be safely cast to String.
holidayObj[keyDesc] cannot be safely cast to String.

LayoutInflater.from(parent.context)
                    .inflate(R.layout.header_row, parent, false) cannot be safely cast to ConstraintLayout.

LayoutInflater.from(parent.context)
                    .inflate(R.layout.holiday_row, parent, false) cannot be safely cast to ConstraintLayout.

LayoutInflater.from(parent.context).inflate(R.layout.year_text_view, parent,
                false) cannot be safely cast to CheckedTextView.
mItem cannot be safely cast to YearItem.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of YearRecyclerAdapter.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class HolidayConfigReader defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class YearItem defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (n % 31) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: n % 31
Parentheses in (-1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: -1

Parentheses in (TimeUnit.DAYS.convert(heute.time.time - datum.time.time,
                    TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).toInt()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: TimeUnit.DAYS.convert(heute.time.time - datum.time.time,
                    TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).toInt()
Parentheses in (-1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: -1

Parentheses in (TimeUnit.DAYS.convert(datum.time.time - heute.time.time,
                    TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).toInt() + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: TimeUnit.DAYS.convert(datum.time.time - heute.time.time,
                    TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS).toInt() + 1

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class DateUtility only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class Holiday contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getDiffToNow
The data class Holiday contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called compareDate
